name: Hide Thumbnails – Disable Thumbnail from Post
author: Mehraz Morshed

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to disable thumbnails from posts of your website.

The “Hide Thumbnails” WordPress plugin is a powerful and user-friendly tool designed to give you complete control over the display of post thumbnails on your WordPress website. Whether you’re looking to streamline your website’s design or want to remove thumbnails where they just don’t fit, this plugin offers an elegant solution.

sections.installation:
Install the Hide Thumbnails plugin via WordPress Dashboard (from plugin directory or from your computer), or upload the files manually to your server and activate the plugin.

Install via WordPress dashboard

From Plugin Directory

  • Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  • Search for ‘Hide Thumbnails’
  • Install and Activate the plugin

From Your Computer

  • Download the Hide Thumbnails plugin
  • Visit ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin’
  • Choose the plugin file in .zip format
  • Click the Install Now button, and Activate after installation

Install via Uploading Files Manually

  • Download the Hide Thumbnails plugin and unzip the folder
  • Upload the folder to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  • Activate the Hide Titles Plugin from Dashboard
sections.faq:
How to hide thumbnail of all posts?

Activate the plugin. That’s it.

How to get thumbnail of all posts back?

Just deactivate the plugin.
